author: Alicia A. Caldwell
title: Trump Administration Ends Obama-Era Policy on Pregnant Immigrant Detainees
text:
The Trump administration said it will treat pregnant immigrant women the same as any other detainees and decide who should be released on a case-by-case basis.
The policy reverses an Obama-era policy that ordered immigration officials to release pregnant women from immigration jails in most cases.
